content: [alette] But Gil...
[alette] Dad!
[alette] He's going to make it?
[alette] Nobody expects you to raise the dead.
/=Alette shakes her head, looking away.=/
/=Alette stops herself from hugging your bandaged chest, pulling your head to her instead. The words come out easier than you expected.=/
[alette] You did everything you could, Eyvind.
/=Eyvind frowns deeply, putting a hand to his forehead.=/
[eyvind] He died almost instantly. By the time I found him...
[eyvind] Normally, a wound like that... I only hope I did enough.
[eyvind rook] Why did Onef do this, Rook? He was talking to you right before it happened.

content.option: He had been planning it all along
He thought my leadership would get us killed

content: [eyvind] There were a lot of people I couldn't save...
[eyvind] Why did Onef do this, Rook? He was talking to you right before it happened.
[iver] Ekkill killed a good half-dozen of Onef's men, by himself. He told me Onef was running Frostvellr the whole time.
[iver] Ekkill was always just the barking dog you put in the yard to find out who your enemies are.
[iver] He left Frostvellr behind when he saw a better opportunity. Guess that relationship is over.
[iver] I don't know, Rook. I really don't.
[iver] I have a good idea.
[iver] I think Onef was running Frostvellr the whole time.
[iver] I think that much is clear.
[iver] It's a good thing Eyvind was here. She's going to pull through, though it was a nasty wound.
[iver] It was no accident Onef went after those of us from Skogr.
[iver] None of this changes the fact that Bellower is out there somewhere, following us.
[iver] Or at worst they'd take all the supplies for themselves and leave the rest as dredge bait.
[iver rook] We have to be more careful. We can't just let anyone join the caravan anymore...

content.option: No, nothing changes. We're not like him.
Where do you draw the line, Iver?

content: [iver] That swamp around Sigrholm might buy us some time, but we've got to keep moving.
[iver] Utter bastard. All this time we had no idea.
[iver] We have to be more careful. We can't just let anyone join the caravan anymore...
[iver] We managed to kill most of those traitorous sons of bitches and the rest fled into the woods.
[iver] You're a better person than I, Rook.
[rook] He must have thought with us gone, he'd take the banner and the rest would fall in line.
[rook] I'll survive.
[rook] Oddleif?
[rook] Oddleif? Gil?
{skip} mark1=rook mark2=iver mark3=alette mark4=eyvind
/=Your body aches all over, but Iver's right. The road calls. The caravan is already starting to pack up camp.=/
/=Your eyes open to the sound of Alette's voice.=/
